entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:02 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023
